newsitem.title: POLAND: MOSTOSTAL-K SEES 97 GROUP, PARENT NET UP.
newsitem.headline: MOSTOSTAL-K SEES 97 GROUP, PARENT NET UP.

text.p: Polish construction firm Mostostal Krakow SA expects to lift its consolidated net profit to 13.5 million zlotys this year from 12.2 million zlotys last year, the firm's president said on Wednesday.
Stanislaw Osieka told a news conference that consolidated sales would rise to 214.9 million zlotys from 190.9 million zlotys.
He said parent net profit would rise this year to 6.1 million zlotys from 4.7 million zlotys in 1996 and that parent sales would rise to 195.5 million zlotgys from 153.7 million.
